text: Gov. Andrew Cuomo: "How people cannot wear masks, that, to me, is even disrespectful. It's disrespectful. It's disrespectful to the nurses, the doctors, the people who have been front line workers, the transit workers. You wear the mask not for yourself." https://t.co/ASWFPbz8gk
